text: Robert William Lay (20 March 1944 â€“ 5 August 2022) was an Australian sprinter. He competed in the men's 100 metres at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Lay was born in New South Wales, Australia. Lay died on 5 August 2022 at the age of 78.Vale: Bob Lay OAM ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Australian sprinters Category:Olympians for Australia Category:Sportspeople from New South Wales
